name: Grim Weeper 0.1
description:
Grim Weeper

The son of Death doesn't want to do what his dad does, its not exactly pleasant. Grim would much prefer anything else. His scythe training ceremony is imminent and he goes on an adventure he didn't expect, nor did his hamster, Mr Binky.

Tailored slightly to accommodate the Adventure Game Challenge at https://itch.io/jam/106-adventure-game-challenge this game begins fully voiced and music but begins to lose those bits the more you explore - I simply ran out of time to voice the remainder. The theme "stranger in a strange land" isn't really touched upon till the end.

Regardless, this is a big learning curve for me. First time using Illustrator, first time using Unity and first time jumping into the deep end of building a Adventure Creator game.

If you enjoyed the game or concept, I fully intend to complete the game to its full potential. Keep tabs on it with the Twitter and Instagram handles: grimweepergame
